Abilities.Textual: auto(vc/rc): when this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's , this unit gets power+3000 until end of that battle.
Abilities.Visual: [00ff00][b]AUTO[/b][-](VC/RC): When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's , this unit gets [00aa00][b]POWER+3000[/b][-] until end of that battle.
